sense.def:
To scatter things over an area
pomeni, da stvari vržemo ali spustimo iz rok tako, da se razletijo naokoli.

seg.quote: Parrots scatter their food about and make a mess.
The papers had been scattered all over the floor.

sense.def:
Kadar več ljudi
scatter
, se naenkrat razidejo in gre vsak v svojo smer.

seg.quote: The boys scattered, squealing in horror.
